text: Crassiclava is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pseudomelatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Crassiclava include: * Crassiclava balteata Kilburn, 1988 * Crassiclava layardi (Sowerby III, 1897) * Crassiclava omia (Barnard, 1958) ;Species brought into synonymy: * Crassiclava apicata Reeve, 1845: synonym of Crassispira apicata (Reeve, 1845) * Crassiclava halistrepta (Bartsch, 1915): synonym of Clionella halistrepta (Bartsch, 1915) ==References== ==External links== * * Bouchet, P.; Kantor, Y. I.; Sysoev, A.; Puillandre, N. (2011). A new operational classification of the Conoidea (Gastropoda). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 77(3): 273-308 * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Pseudomelatomidae Category:Pseudomelatomidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Crassiclava
